content.html: While I don't agree with abortions, I do have to say that sometimes, getting an abortion is a better choice. It's the decision of the woman that's carrying a fetus, not some nosy busy-body onlooker who says "Life's Precious!" but doesn't care about homeless, orphaned kids!
content.value:
While I don't agree with abortions, I do have to say that sometimes, getting an abortion is a better choice.
It's the decision of the woman that's carrying a fetus, not some nosy busy-body onlooker who says "Life's Precious!" but doesn't care about homeless, orphaned kids!
